src:
Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton wins 6th Formula One world title at US Grand Prix
03 Nov 2019, 20:48 by EndPlay
AUSTIN, Texas - AUSTIN, Texas (AP) - Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton wins 6th Formula One world title at US Grand Prix.
